subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Troy Ruths scored 33 points and Washington of Missouri claimed its first N.C.A.A. Division III title with a 90-68 victory over Amherst, the defending champion, in Salem, Va.
snippet: Troy Ruths scored 33 points and Washington of Missouri claimed its first N.C.A.A. Division III title with a 90-68 victory over Amherst, the defending champion, in Salem, Va.
